text: The world will impose it's expectations on you. Tell you what your success is. What you failure is. Define it for yourself anyway.
Your kindness might cause you pain
column4: cause you betrayal
column5: cause you heartburn. Be kind anyway.

text: Boys will be told not to cry. Girls not to laugh out aloud. Cry anyway. Laugh anyway.
Your ego will tell you that you don‚Äôt need help. Seek help anyway.
Your teams may seem naive
column4: inexperienced and not ready to be trusted. Trust anyway.

text: You will find most comfort in your own company but they will tell you come hang out with us and don't be boring. Be with yourself anyway.
You will struggle to smile and show up. Show up anyway.
The world might not value the experiences you share. Share anyway.
You will be mocked for taking the unconventional path
column4: for going against society. Go against society anyway.

text: You will be hated for the times you take harsh decisions. Take decisions anyway.
Family will suffer because you have less and less time to love. Love anyway.
Other‚Äôs success will generate massive self doubt every morning you get up. Get up anyway.
You will be ridiculed for being so anxious and pessimistic all the time. Feel these real emotions anyway.
You will be misunderstood because of your irrational optimism. Be optimistic anyway.
A thread on anyway...
